newsitem.title: USA: SpectRx IPO price range cut.
newsitem.headline: SpectRx IPO price range cut.

text.p: The price to buy shares in the initial public offering of SpectRx Inc was cut to $7 to $9 from an earlier estimate of $10 to $12.
Lead underwriter Hambrecht & Quist said the two million share offering will price tonight for trading tomorrow on the Nasdaq under the symbol SPRX.O.
The company is involved in devloping products that offer painless and bloodless alternatives to monitor glucose levels and screen for diabetes and infant jaundice.
About 7.5 million shares will be outstanding after the offering, according to the company's prospectus.
